text: Paul M.J. Staes (3 December 1945 â€“ 13 November 2024) was a Belgian politician. He was a member of the Groen, Christian Social Party and Open Flemish Liberals and Democrats. He served as a member for the European Parliament between 1984 and 1994 and was a senator in Belgium between 1995 and 1999. Staes died in Schoten on 13 November 2024, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:Belgian politicians Category:1945 births Category:2024 deaths Category:MEPs for Belgium
title: Paul Staes
